page.title: 16FARMING
page.content: The farms in the area are all small ranging in size from 46-95 acres. All the farms concentrate on{arable {farming}growing such crops as barley, wheat, oil seed rape, sugar beet, hay and potatoes. One of the farms also possesses a small{dairy herd}of fresian cows and some horses. The 3 000 bales of hay harvested each year are used to supplement their feed. A number of the farms are under the process of land shrinkage due to industrial and residential encroachment. Farms own their own equipment which include such items as ploughs, trailers, and a number of tractors.
